Source.Name: perl-file-slurper
Source.Summary: File::Slurper - A simple, sane and efficient module to slurp a file
Source.Description: This module provides functions for fast and correct slurping and spewing. All functions are optionally exported. All functions throw exceptions on errors, write functions don't return any meaningful value.

Package.Name: perl-file-slurper

Package.Description: This module provides functions for fast and correct slurping and spewing. All functions are optionally exported. All functions throw exceptions on errors, write functions don't return any meaningful value.
